pkgmetadata.longdescription: Partially Overlapping Samples Tests // Tests for a comparison of two partially overlapping samples. A comparison of means using the partially overlapping samples t-test: See Derrick, Russ, Toher and White (2017), Test statistics for the comparison of means for two samples which include both paired observations and independent observations, Journal of Modern Applied Statistical Methods, 16(1). A comparison of proportions using the partially overlapping samples z-test: See Derrick, Dobson- Mckittrick, Toher and White (2015), Test statistics for comparing two proportions with partially overlapping samples. Journal of Applied Quantitative Methods, 10(3).
